body:
Hey guys!  Today is going to be different from my regular posts, Usually i discuss about gameplay and such maybe something else... But today, I will be giving you people of Avicus a Really cool Pack (In my opinion). Great for PVP, However this is version 1.0, So if you want to wait until version 1.1 is released where its edited for Soup pvp you may wait, i am not forcing you to download this :), But if you do it would be much appreciated :D

Without further a due, lets get into the links:

Images........... I think you may want to see the pack before downloading it xD

Download......So here is the download if you like it :)

**For staff: I did not see in the forum rules to Post/Release YOUR OWN resource packs, so please contact me before locking**

Hope you enyoy! :D  *ALSO LEAVE SUGGESTIONS* :)

Credits:

Potions: PotPVP pack
Low fire: Huahwi's 64x Defscape Edit
Bow: (I forgot :P)
Crit/Sharpness particles and particles in all: Huahwi's 64x Defscape Edit
Armor: Huahwi's 64x Defscape Edit
Widgets: (I forgot :P)
Text: Tiggy's Default Edit.
Swords: Me....... Stone sword: 64x64 Sphax PureBD Craft.

     COMPLETED: Another texture pack almost complete still gonna update it :) (Coming soon)

title: My first pack release :3 FaithFul Edit 32x
